paper_abstract: Conventional fixed-point implementation of the DCT coefficients quantization algorithm in video compression may result in deteriorated image quality. The paper investigates this problem and proposes an improved floating-to-fixed-point conversion scheme. With a proper scaling factor and a new-established look-up table, the proposed fixed-point scheme can obtain bit-wise consistence to the floating-point realization. Experimental results verify the validity of the proposed method.
paper_title: An Improved Floating-to-Fixed-Point Conversion Scheme for DCT Quantization Algorithm
